text: I came to Pani Anna Kowalska based on reviews, and after 3 months of collaboration, I know I couldn't have made a better choice. She is an angel, not a human! Vast knowledge, full professionalism, lots of empathy for the patient, and even more good and smart advice. This is just the beginning of our collaboration, but I already know that with such support and help, I will manage everything I came for. I recommend!

During one visit, I learned more about my diet, metabolism, and nutrition than from several previous dietitians combined! Pani Anna Kowalska is the definition of 'a doctor with a calling'. I wholeheartedly recommend and see you at the follow-up!

Impressive knowledge and the way it is conveyed by the dietitian convinces and motivates to introduce changes in nutrition. The dietitian gives lots of great advice, sometimes small ones, which are a discovery even for people interested in healthy food. The effects were huge after the first visit, and each subsequent one is another discovery of new, effective tips. I have never been so satisfied with collaboration with a dietitian and never had such results. I'm losing kilograms, fat, including visceral fat, gaining muscles and well-being. I highly recommend.

What can I write. I came for a 20-minute visit, left after an hour, and if there was time, I would probably still be sitting. Understanding, empathy, tolerance, professional help, psychologist, analyst, and just a 'cool person'. I am 50 years old and never used a dietitian until now, and I was lucky to come across Pani Doktor. I recommend with all my heart, I envy the knowledge and competence. I will incorporate everything into my diet, trust 100%, I am motivated, convinced, and ready to fight for myself. Thank you and see you! And for those who are still wondering... go for it!
Pani Anna Kowalska listened to me and devoted a lot of attention and engagement. I felt understood and received the support I needed.

Pani Doktor approaches the patient's matter professionally, thoroughly, and in-depth. The communication style was clear, empathetic, understandable, and very pleasant. I am very satisfied and recommend visits to Pani Doktor. A doctor with a calling.

Thank you for an exceptional visit — for your engagement, willingness to share knowledge about a healthy lifestyle, and very detailed recommendations. I left the office inspired and motivated to implement healthy habits. Pani Anna Kowalska is a wonderful professional and person. Thank you!

Pani Anna Kowalska is a specialist like few others — empathetic, friendly, understands that changing eating habits requires education and weight loss is a side effect of long-term action. You can feel she does it with passion. I am glad I came to Pani Anna Kowalska.
A top-class specialist. I highly recommend Pani Anna Kowalska.
I recommend. Pani Doktor was engaged and explained the action plan.
Pani Anna Kowalska is a professional, reliable, very thorough, engaged, and above all, she cares about helping. I warmly recommend!
She is concrete, listens to the patient, answers questions, does not overload with unnecessary information. Presents a clear action plan. So far, I am very satisfied.
Comfortable and safe, a successful first visit :)
A very nice and at the same time substantive visit, lots of valuable content conveyed in a short time, positive energy, accessible presentation of the action plan
Competence, kindness, absolute willingness to help, everything was explained.
I am after the first visit with Pani Anna Kowalska, very, very recommend! Engagement and listening to the patient are a big plus. I am happy with this choice.
Pani Anna Kowalska is a great dietitian with a common-sense approach. She can listen to the patient and create an effective diet according to the given preferences.

I am after the first consultation with Pani Anna Kowalska and I must admit that I haven't had the pleasure of using the services of such an empathetic and professional specialist in a long time. I felt heard, understood, and taken care of. Pani Anna Kowalska is a very friendly and warm person. She explains everything thoroughly, and above all, she knows how to listen. The way of planning the diet with small and feasible steps gave me courage, motivation, and above all, hope for a good change. I warmly thank Pani Anna Kowalska and look forward to the next meeting. I recommend because it's worth it!

After many attempts with various specialists, only with Pani Anna Kowalska did I feel that someone really understood me. For a long time, I struggled with energy and mood problems, and already at the first visit, Pani Anna Kowalska accurately identified the cause and selected supplementation and a simple, effective nutrition plan. The effects appeared very quickly — I regained strength, mental clarity, and inner peace. Pani Anna Kowalska is nice, concrete, engaged, and really wants to help. You can see she does it from the heart. I wholeheartedly recommend to everyone looking for real change.

I have dealt with several dietitians in Bielsko, but as an ultra-runner for years, I was looking for someone who not only knows the theory but also runs themselves and understands the real needs of athletes. I came across dietitian Jan Kowalski — a passionate both about running and dietetics. Before recommending something, he tests it on himself. Without arrogance, with a huge amount of knowledge and a human approach. Finally, I feel I am on the right path. I recommend with all my heart!
